structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
URBAN SERVICES DISTRICTS -- AMBULANCE SERVICE DISTRICTS

law.catch_line: Change of name for expanded district.
law.text: If, in the event of expansion of the district, it becomes apparent that the existing name is inappropriate, then the board of the district may change its name at any regularly-called meeting, by an affirmative vote of two-thirds (2/3) majority of the total membership.
law.history: Created 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 231, sec. 7, effective July 15, 1982.
